content.en: Enhanced FCM Clustering: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to improve the performance of the fuzzy c-means (FCM) clustering algorithm for image segmentation. These algorithms incorporate spatial neighborhood information, penalty terms, and membership functions to reduce noise sensitivity, improve clustering speed, and enhance overall clustering performance. By addressing the challenges of FCM algorithms, these algorithms aim to improve the accuracy and robustness of image segmentation.
content.da: Forbedret FCM Klyngeanalyse: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre ydelsen af fuzzy c-means (FCM) klyngeanalysealgoritmen til billedsegmentering. Disse algoritmer inkorporerer rumlige nabolagsinformationer, strafled og medlemskabsfunktioner for at reducere støjfølsomhed, forbedre klyngehastigheden og øge den samlede klyngeperformance. Ved at adressere udfordringerne ved FCM-algoritmerne sigter disse algoritmer mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden og robustheden af billedsegmentering.
